scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd apps/* && rm -rf node_modules && yarn
scripts.dev-ios: cd apps/mobile && eas build --profile development --platform ios
scripts.dev-android: cd apps/mobile && eas build --profile development --platform android
scripts.beta-ios: cd apps/mobile && eas build --profile beta --platform ios
scripts.beta-android: cd apps/mobile && eas build --profile beta --platform android
